ivory.ptc.data

Class PseudoQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.ptc.data.PseudoQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<PseudoQuery>, Writable, WritableComparable<PseudoQuery>

    public class PseudoQuery
extends Object
implements WritableComparable<PseudoQuery>
    Data structure that represents a pseudo query. Along with the text of the pseudo query, this object provides a field that measures the quality of the pseudo query as a quality score.
    Author:
    Nima Asadi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PseudoQuery()
      Constructs a pseudo query with no text and a quality score of zero.
